name: MIMIC Database
class: other contributed collections of data, including works in progress
description: MIMIC Database.  The PhysioBank archives contain 72 complete records from this database, together with periodic measurements ("numerics") for all 121 records of the database, including multiple recordings of some of the 90 subjects.  The lengths of these records vary, but average about 40 hours each.  The PhysioNet core collection includes records 037, 039, and 041, as well as the numerics for all 121 records;  the other available records are available from the master PhysioNet server and from some mirrors.
reference_name:
Moody GB, Mark RG. A Database to Support Development and Evaluation of
Intelligent Intensive Care Monitoring.  Computers in Cardiology
23:657–660 (1996).
